title: Strengthening Medical Practical Competencies: Teacher Professional Development for Synchronous Online Mathematics Instruction

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Apply three or more technical strategies (e.g., whiteboard utilization, real-time polling tools) to effectively deliver mathematics instruction in synchronous online environments
Improve and apply their own lesson designs to actual classes at least twice based on peer teacher feedback
Participants can execute the online math lesson module developed using the PBL approach at least once and complete a self-reflection journal (3 entries) on the lesson videos.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
